```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(getcoords)

df <- geocode(location = sample_data)

```

```{r map, fig.width=7.3}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = providers$OpenStreetMap) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(data = df, 
                   lng = ~lon, 
                   lat = ~lat, 
                   radius = 0.5, 
                   color = "red",
                   popup = ~loc.input
                  )

```
